title-group.article-title: Sugar-free, glycine-stabilized intravenous immunoglobulin prevents skin but not renal disease in the MRL/lpr mouse model of systemic lupus

body.p: Z Racz, E Nagy, L Rosivall, J Szebeni and P Hamar, published in Lupus (2010) 19, 599–612, DOI: 10.1177/0961203309355299

The author’s would like to make the following correction to table 1. The published data were not divided by the number of cases.

The title of the table (Skin disease: macroscopic and microscopic scores of intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG) and saline-treated MRL/lpr mice) is correct. The changes do not influence description of these results or their discussion.
The authors would like to apologize for any inconvenience caused.
